name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Poop Clicker Game Online Free Play

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Poop Clicker Online is just another silly clicking game like Pizza Pusher. Move your mouse over the little brown pile and get hits.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f:
Poop Clicker is just another silly clicking game like Pizza Pusher. Move your mouse over the little brown pile and get as many hits as you can. You can buy useful upgrades after getting the certain amount of clicks. 

Upgrades will help you to collect clicks faster and faster. Level up and make the turd look good in Poop Clicker.

You will have a hard time finding a game that is more primitive and easy than this one. The only aim you pursue is to get as many clicks as possible. Buy a baby or buy a toilet - as long as it helps you get to your goal faster, it's welcome.

 Don't forget to upgrade once in a while so you don't have to click too much yourself. Let the others work! Are you ready for this smelly challenge? Find out and much fun with Poop Clicker, online and for free on Silvergames.com!

Controls: Mouse
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fil,lt,lv,pt:
Poop Clicker Online is just another silly clicking game like Pizza Pusher. Move your mouse over the little brown pile and get hits.

How To Play Poop Clicker Game Online :-

1. Firstly Click on "Add To Chrome" Button.
2. After Install, you will redirect in another page where you play this Game online.
3. If you want to play offline without goes to site then click on "Extension Icon".
4. Enjoy

Controls: Mouse
